title: Help: Creating a New Help Article
body:
Help: Creating a New Help Article¶

To create a new help article, follow the steps below.
When you save this help article, it will not yet be published. To publish it, refer to Help Articles.

  1. Click in the ribbon

  2. Click Platform

  3. Click Help

  4. Click in the upper right hand corner

  5. Enter a title

  6. Click Choose an app and select the app to which the help article belongs

  7. Choose videos to accompany the help article

    • Choose three videos for the different displays: Desktop (1024x768), desktop small (644x483), and mobile (279x483)

  8. Enter the body of the help article

  9. Click Save
toc: • Help: Creating a New Help Article
